mapper.select: SELECT person_code, hospital_code, pet_person_code, reserve_time, reserve_date, reserve_text, reserve_information_collection FROM tbl_reserve;
SELECT person_code, hospital_code, pet_person_code, reserve_time, reserve_date, reserve_text, reserve_information_collection FROM tbl_reserve WHERE person_code = #{personCode} LIMIT 1

SELECT person_code, hospital_code, pet_person_code, reserve_time, reserve_date, reserve_text, reserve_information_collection FROM tbl_reserve WHERE person_code = #{personCode} and hospital_code = #{hospitalCode} LIMIT 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_reserve ( person_code, hospital_code, pet_person_code, reserve_time, reserve_date, reserve_text, reserve_information_collection ) VALUES ( #{personCode}, #{hospitalCode}, #{petPersonCode}, #{reserveTime}, #{reserveDate}, #{reserveText}, #{reserveInformationCollection} )
